ch0092_80_iris/0101_0701_01_10:
Finally! Hydreigon and I were looking all over for
you, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0092_80_iris/0101_0701_02_10: Let’s make a bunch of new friends today, OK?
ch0092_80_iris/7101_0701_01_10:
Some people think Hydreigon is kind of scary
because it’s known as a Brutal Pokémon.
ch0092_80_iris/7101_0701_02_10:
But when I pet my Hydreigon on the head, she
closes her eyes and looks really happy!
ch0092_80_iris/7101_0701_03_10: Do you wanna try petting her, too?
ch0092_80_iris/7102_0701_01_10:
Battles are so interesting. The more you battle, the
stronger you get—and the better you understand
your opponent!
ch0092_80_iris/7102_0701_02_10:
Thanks to battles, I’ve been able to make a lot of
new friends!
ch0092_80_iris/7102_0701_03_10:
I wanna battle you a lot more, too,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0092_80_iris/7103_0701_01_10: The other day, someone said I was cute.
ch0092_80_iris/7103_0701_02_10:
And I mean, that made me kinda happy, but I’m
just as strong as I am cute, y’know! I’m a
Champion, after all!
ch0092_80_iris/7103_0701_03_10:
You shouldn’t let your guard down when you
battle me, OK?
ch0092_80_iris/7104_0701_01_10:
There are a lot of really pretty and fashionable
people here on Pasio.
ch0092_80_iris/7104_0701_02_10:
I gotta do better and show off my creative
side, too!
ch0092_80_iris/7104_0701_03_10: Wanna dress up together with me sometime?
ch0092_80_iris/7105_0701_01_10:
People say I’m the girl who knows the hearts
of dragons...
ch0092_80_iris/7105_0701_02_10:
But I don’t even understand my own 
heart sometimes!
ch0092_80_iris/7105_0701_03_10:
Do you ever feel that way,
too, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0092_80_iris/1701_0701_01_10: Here! You can have this, if you like!
ch0092_80_iris/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it’ll help you a lot!
ch0092_80_iris/2501_0701_01_10:
In Unova, there was a group of people called
Team Plasma who kept trying to separate Pokémon
from Trainers.
ch0092_80_iris/2501_0701_02_10:
I can’t believe they even did that. Pokémon and
people are only together because we like
each other!
ch0092_80_iris/2501_0702_01_10:
Of course if you like someone, you’ll wanna be by
their side!
ch0092_80_iris/2501_0702_02_10:
As Champion, I wanna be strong enough to
protect people who feel that way.
ch0092_80_iris/2511_0701_01_10:
This is one of my favorite outfits! Grandpa
Drayden got it for me.
ch0092_80_iris/2511_0701_02_10:
I like it a lot, but I’d also like to try picking my
own clothes, too!
ch0092_80_iris/2511_0701_03_10: One day, I wanna show everyone my own style!
ch0092_80_iris/2511_0702_01_10:
I’m interested in all kinds of styles! Not just cute
styles but also pretty, cool, and even more
grown-up styles, too!
ch0092_80_iris/2511_0702_02_10:
I wonder what kind of style I’ll settle on when I
grow up.
ch0092_80_iris/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning, sleepyhead! The best way to wake
up is with a Pokémon battle, you know!
ch0092_80_iris/3003_0701_01_10:
If you want to get stronger, training and battling
are really important, but you can’t forget to take
breaks sometimes, too!
ch0092_80_iris/3005_0701_01_10:
Oh, hi! Are you doing some night training?
Careful not to push yourself if you get sleepy.
The key to getting stronger is getting lots of rest!
